Description: Business Development Associate is an individual contributor role in employee-oriented.High-performance environment that emphasizes selling various 90+ products.Your role will be starting with identifying potential customers & counseling them on 90+ ways of simplified and productive study methodology.Roles & ResponsibilitiesIdentifying prospect customers.Ensuring appointments to take direct session.Conducting number of sessions instructed by Sales Manager.Meeting the revenue responsibility communicated by the Sales Manager.Ensuring proper updation of reports instructed by the Sales Manager.We are looking forward to meet some super natural extroverts and take you through the job profile which is to connect with students and parents to explain our 90+ my tuition app which has made millions of student's educational life easier.Qualifications: Must be a Graduate (B.Tech/BBA/B.com/MBA)Experience: 1-4 yearsSkills
Skills: Aggressive sales mindset with positive attitude
Willingness to learn and sales aptitude.
